title: Riot Mystery Gift
body:
Hey guys, haven't been on the boards lately but will get back to posting frequently in the coming weeks.

I logged in today and as I'm sure many of you would have also noticed you would have received a mystery gift from Riot Games. I think this is a pretty cool start to the new year in terms of building a stronger community bond between players and Riot Games and for that I thank you. 

Regards,
lols =)

replies.body:
what ya get?

i got goalkeeper blitz( i have iblitz and riot already)

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ehWEc1UP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T11:34:24.074+0000)
>
> what ya get?
> 
> i got goalkeeper blitz( i have iblitz and riot already)

I got urfrider corki on one account and commander Jarvan on another. Goalkeeper blitz is nice!
